cleaned_text: Immune Boost Infusion Boost your immune system with nutrients to help fight infections and start feeling better sooner! The Immune Boost IV Infusion is specially formulated to help give your body vitamins, minerals and antioxidants to help nourish your cells when they are trying to fight off an immune invader. Great for colds, flu and other infections! Treatment: 45-60 minutes Frequency: At onset of cold or signs & symptoms of illness. Daily as desired. The Immune Boost has a powerful combination of vitamins and nutrients including B-Complex, B5, B6, B12, Magnesium, Calcium, Potassium and 10,000mg C! The Immune Boost also has Glutathione 1000mg pushed at the end for a powerful free radical scavenger and potent antioxidant. From our Customers "Wow my energy came back quick after that infusion this morning! I'm feeling a lot better right now (fingers crossed) even better tomorrow morning! - Sara These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
